source_caption: Table 2: Performance comparison in HICO-DET. The Detector column is denoted as ‘COCO’ for the models that freeze the object detectors with the weights pre-trained in MS-COCO and ‘HICO-DET’ if the object detector is fine-tuned with the HICO-DET train set. The each letter in Feature column stands for A: Appearance (Visual features), S: Interaction Patterns (Spatial Correlations [5]), P: Pose Estimation, L: Linguistic Priors, V: Volume [15].
